_meta.name: Starter information
_meta.short-description: Short starter information about the Raiders Inn Discord server
_meta.long-description: This will post some starter information about the Raiders Inn Discord server.

howto.response: The Raiders Inn is a Guild Wars 2 raiding community. In order to get started, first **please read {{channel}} completely**. Everything you need to know is listed there. Have fun raiding!
howto.response-no-dm: This command can not be executed in DM.
